replies.bodyText: Sort of - it assumes that the set of members in the Raft is static, so it's really just filtering out the local member. But this is independent of the discovery protocol.
replies.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: You use the ClusterMemberShipService to get the members or?

replies.bodyText: It's used initially to get the local member ID, and later to check if a member is reachable. So this assumes member IDs are static, and the Raft configuration is also static - but whether they are reachable or not is dynamic and relies on SWIM.
